titleStmt.title: Articles of war agreed upon between His Grace the Duke of Schonberg and Teige O'Reagan for the surrender of Charlemont, the twelfth of May, 1690
titleStmt.author: Schomberg, Friedrich Hermann Schomberg, Duke of, 1615-1690.
